videos.description: Lauri Markkanen gets the better of Nikola Jokic, picking off his pass on defense and then throwing down a dunk over him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Markkanen dunks all over Jokic for posterizing slam) 2021/10/25 ESHEET
